title.narrative: Sri Lanka: Increasing trade competitiveness of small and medium enterprises in regional and European Union markets

description.narrative: PROJECT BACKGROUND: During the PA phase in 2015 UNIDO formulated a trade-related programme with the International Trade Centre (ITC), which is funded by the European Union (EU). The Ministry of Industry and Commerce of the Government of Sri Lanka (MIC) and the EU Delegation designated ITC as the lead agency for the design and management of the project. The MIC through its Department of Commerce (DoC) will act as the main government counterpart facilitating communication and coordination among the various line Ministries. The expected results under component 3 and 4 fall under UNIDO’s core mandate, while component 1 and 2 under ITC..
